titleInfo.title: Ext 6200/45 'Copies of 'Times' to be forwarded by Air Bag to Sir G Prior'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 20; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding arrangements for copies of The Timesto be sent to the Political Resident, Persian Gulf. As well as the Political Resident, the primary correspondents are: India Office; Government of India; Commonwealth Relations Office.
